title: Facilitation of coke gasification by coking wastewater and its degradation properties in thermochemical reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17724-17732
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01344A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yang Geng, Haobin Hu, Yun Wu, Zhijun Li, Yani Lu, Penghui Zhang, Jinfeng Bai
The thermochemical reaction between coking wastewater and gasification-coke is a new way to achieve efficient and clean use of coal and solve the problem of coking wastewater treatment in the Gansu Longdong region.
